title: 3 Useful Tips to Get a Fist Bump Gun Buddy in Valorant

steps.title: Demonstrate good sportsmanship.
steps.content: Demonstrate good sportsmanship . A Fist Bump Gun Buddy is a charm that can embellish your weapon in Valorant . However, the only way to receive it is from an official Riot employee. [1] X Research source There's always a chance you'll match up with an employee in a game, and if you're on your best behavior, you could be rewarded accordingly! Good sportsmanship can be shown in a variety of ways: Be respectful to your team and other players. This applies to both voice chat and text chat. Play the game fairly and without any cheats or hacks . Offer help and support to others. Valorant is a team-based game; showing your dedication to succeed as a team is a great way to motivate others and build a positive environment. Maintain a positive attitude. Whether you win or lose a match, practice humbleness. Don't belittle or insult others when you lose, and don't rub it in the other team's face when you win. At the very least, offer the standard "GG" before moving on.

steps.title: Avoid potential scams.
steps.content: Avoid potential scams. A real Riot employee will never offer to sell you a Gun Buddy. You should also be wary of any contests or other ways to earn the Gun Buddy. You don't have to be a master gamer to earn a Gun Buddy. Riot employees won't ask you to do anything in exchange.

steps.title: Never ask for the Gun Buddy.
steps.content: Never ask for the Gun Buddy. Asking to be recognized can come across as disingenuous and can decrease your chances of receiving one. Additionally, employees have a limit of how many Fist Bump Gun Buddies they can give out. Be patient and keep practicing good sportsmanship; you may be rewarded sooner than you think.
